name: SpaceXscape
description:
Escape the meteor shower!! (early access)

Hi, this is my submission at the GameJam Ludum Dare 51!  Theme: "Every 10 seconds"

for now it's incomplete, but I'll finish this soon. Have fun!

Comands:

- W/S or Arrows to move Up/Down

- Spacebar to shoot

at the moment there isn't an escape button to quit,  just press  CTRL+F4 or go back.
